article_title: Communication plays a big role in Sterling's financial success
article_text:
Lake City, Pa. — Cary Quigley remembers the humble beginnings at Sterling Technologies Inc.

The company had three or four employees and one machine. Every contract was like gold.

“Geez, I remember getting excited over an $8,000 job,” Quigley said. “When you have no customers, any piece of business gets exciting. Certainly, now we get excited over the
